Free information service user agreement"

"One, the" agreement" to grant you the following rights:"

"Installation and use:"

"You can copy, distribute and disseminate an unlimited number of software products, but you must ensure that each reproduction, distribution and dissemination must be true and complete, including all software products on this software, electronic documents, copyright and trademark notices, also including this agreement."

"Two, costs:"

"You must pay personal Internet or third party ( including but not limited to, telecommunications or mobile communication provider ) communication charge fee, fee information and other related costs. As related to value-added telecom services, we recommend you and value-added service provider to confirm the related costs. Any of the software update, update and other change will be the subject of this agreement."

"Three, privacy protection"

"To protect user privacy is a free information service is a basic policy, ensure not open to the public or to the third party to provide a single user registration information and users in the use of network services non-public content, except in the following situations:"

"Prior to obtaining the clear authorization of user;"

"According to the relevant laws and regulations;"

"In accordance with the relevant government departments in charge of the requirements;"

"In order to safeguard the public interest;"

"To safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of a letter."

"In the disclosed single user privacy under the premise, has the right to the user database are analyzed and the user database for commercial use."

"In four, the opening of free information service needs to send a message to the server to complete the registration fee, with ordinary SMS messages, by charge carriers, Le frog does not charge any fees.
